For what it's worth, I started iaido about a year ago to complement my
aiki=
do training. I bought the Tokujo Jidai Koshirai from e-bogu.com

Supposedly=
 it's on sale, though it's been so for about a year now (or
more!).

Seems =
to be fine, though I'm anything but a sword expert. My teacher
(a USAF-WR s=
hidoin) seems to think it's a bit light, but more than
adequate.

I'm happy=
 with it.

-Pat
